description.narrative: 1. Overall Objectives: The project supports the Government's transport sector objectives to improve the road network to the country's eastern mountainous areas i order to develop their full socio-economic potential as well as to ensure their political and administrative integratin with the rest of the country. 2. Specific Objective: To upgrade the primary road newwork that traverses the fifficult terrain of the north-eastern part of the country to bitumen standard to provide safe and less costly communication between Mokhotlong and Oxbow and further to and from the western lowlands of the country including the capital Maseru.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
